text:
Sex and The city is no doubt one of 
the most iconic series ever made.

As a huge fan, I'm super excited for the 
release of the new series and just like that

which is out this week. Before you learn with 
Carrie Bradshaw and friends, I want to let you

know that we help learners just like you to 
understand fast English without getting lost,

without missing the jokes and without subtitles. 
Just like Elzo who says that our lessons really

help to watch every video in English without 
subtitles, just like we promised. So join

our community of almost 5 million subscribers 
now by hitting the button and bell down below.

Do you want to understand fast speaking 
natives? And how about when we tell jokes

or use advanced vocabulary that you weren't taught 
in school? Well, we will help you understand all

of this and speak English more confidently and 
naturally with our FREE three-part master class.

Sign up by clicking up here or the 
link down in the description below.
